learning_objectives.description: Interpret and obtain the equation of a straight-line graph in the form y = mx + c.

subtopic.notes_and_examples:
Questions may:
• use and request lines in the forms y = mx + c, x = k
• involve finding the equation when the graph is given
• ask for the gradient or y-intercept of a graph from an equation, e.g. find the gradient and y-intercept of the graph with the equation y = 6x + 3.
Candidates are expected to give equations of a line in a fully simplified form.
